name: Slide the Picture Puzzle-The Puzzle of Moving Pieces
name_original: Slide the Picture Puzzle-The Puzzle of Moving Pieces
description: SliderPhoto Puzzle is a simple fun photo-puzzle game, slide the tiles around the empty space to rearrange the pictures. Two different boards 2by3 for beginners and 3by4 for more challenging puzzles, no time restriction so no rush, the less movement you can solve the puzzle the more star you gain. have fun!
